org.apache.flink.runtime.dispatcher

接口 DispatcherGateway

  • 所有超级接口:
    FencedRpcGateway<DispatcherId>, RestfulGateway, RpcGateway
    所有已知实现类:
    Dispatcher, StandaloneDispatcher

    public interface DispatcherGateway
extends FencedRpcGateway<DispatcherId>, RestfulGateway
    Gateway for the Dispatcher component.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法

    • 方法详细资料

      • submitJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> submitJob(JobGraph jobGraph,
                                                              Time timeout)
        Submit a job to the dispatcher.
        参数:
        jobGraph - JobGraph to submit
        timeout - RPC timeout
        返回:
        A future acknowledge if the submission succeeded

      • listJobs

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.util.Collection<JobID>> listJobs(Time timeout)
        List the current set of submitted jobs.
        参数:
        timeout - RPC timeout
        返回:
        A future collection of currently submitted jobs

      • cancelJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> cancelJob(JobID jobId,
                                                              Time timeout)
        Cancel the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to cancel
        timeout - of the operation
        返回:
        A future acknowledge if the cancellation succeeded

      • stopJob

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Acknowledge> stopJob(JobID jobId,
                                                            Time timeout)
        Stop the given job.
        参数:
        jobId - identifying the job to stop
        timeout - of the operation
        返回:
        A future acknowledge if the stopping succeeded

      • getBlobServerPort

        java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<java.lang.Integer> getBlobServerPort(Time timeout)
        Returns the port of the blob server.
        参数:
        timeout - of the operation
        返回:
        A future integer of the blob server port
